text: Snail mail refers to packages sent via conventional postal delivery. It may also refer to: * Snail Mail (video game), a video game * Snail Mail (musician), a musician == See also== *Snail Mail No More, title of a book *"Snail Mail", the title of a 2016 episode of Sponge Squarepants's ninth season
title: Snail Mail (disambiguation)
